description: Creates personalized daily/weekly study plans based on priorities, deadlines, and learned successful strategies

study_techniques.name: Pomodoro Technique
study_techniques.description: 25 minutes focused study followed by 5-minute breaks

study_techniques.name: Spaced Repetition
study_techniques.description: Review material at increasing intervals to improve retention

study_techniques.name: Active Recall
study_techniques.description: Test yourself without looking at notes to strengthen memory

study_techniques.name: Feynman Technique
study_techniques.description: Explain concepts in simple terms as if teaching someone else

result.recommendations: Based on optimal learning strategies, I recommend starting your day with high-priority subjects when mental energy is highest. Incorporate regular breaks to prevent burnout and maintain focus. Use active recall and spaced repetition for exam preparation, especially for subjects requiring memorization. Schedule collaborative study sessions mid-week to reinforce understanding. Reserve weekends for comprehensive review and addressing weak areas. Maintain consistent sleep patterns and avoid cramming sessions, as distributed practice yields better long-term retention.
